title: Ironside Malphite Skin stops Bandit mastery
body:
Hello, I recent bought the Ironside Malphite Skin. And the mastery point of Bandit ability  (gain 1 gold each nearby minion kill) stops working. 
So I had to stop using the skin. :(

replies.body:
Hey WoWiWei,

Thanks for the report! This wouldn't be something that affects a skin specifically, but rather the champion as a whole. I can pass this on to the Champion team to take a look at!

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=lq6T5LBX,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-01-05T18:26:36.928+0000)
>
> Hey WoWiWei,
> 
> Thanks for the report! This wouldn't be something that affects a skin specifically, but rather the champion as a whole. I can pass this on to the Champion team to take a look at!

Thank you Katey!
If I switch back to the original malphite skin, the bandit ability works again. So whatever the problem is, thanks a lot for passing this on!

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=lq6T5LBX,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-01-05T18:26:36.928+0000)
>
> Hey WoWiWei,
> 
> Thanks for the report! This wouldn't be something that affects a skin specifically, but rather the champion as a whole. I can pass this on to the Champion team to take a look at!

Not always, darius e was bugged on dunkmaster for a very long time, but didn't affect any other skins.
I didn't say always. ^-^ In this case, it's not skin specific.
